svcproc.title: TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: The EST service tool can be used to retrieve a fault code that has been set in the ECM. The EST may also be used to clear these fault codes once the problem has been resolved.
To determine the operation of the brake switch circuit it is possible to monitor the EST data list and the brake status will be displayed.
